m_szDocSumamry: Mitsubishi Rescued By Nissan May 12th, 2016 by Steve Hanley   Editor’s Note: As we noted last week, Mitsubishi became the 4th automaker to reach 100,000 global sales of one of its electric models — in this case, the Mitsubishi Outlander Plug-In Hybrid . Nissan was 1st (by far) back in January 2014 with the Nissan LEAF . Bringing Mitsubishi into the Nissan fold could have interesting results for the EV market, particularly since Mitsubishi and Nissan have used very different approaches, and different battery suppliers.
